tool_description: This API extracts topics from texts, helping you organize large amounts of text data. Configure this API in [the Language Studio](https://studio.oneai.com/?pipeline=65q5HR&utm_medium=topics&utm_source=rapidapi)
name: Article Topic Extraction
title: Article Topic Extraction

api_list.name: Topics
api_list.description:
Send a POST request to this endpoint to extract topics from an article.
Enter text input as a JSON object with an `input` field of type `string`.
In the response, output[0].labels contains a list of topics.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/pipeline"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
